mapper.update: update TOM_GRADE_DIMENSION set STATUS = 'N' where GRADE_DIMENSION_ID = #{gradeDimensionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.insert: insert into TOM_GRADE_DIMENSION (GRADE_DIMENSION_ID, GRADE_DIMENSION_NUMBER, GRADE_DIMENSION_NAME,GRADE_DIMENSION_NAME_EN, GRADE_DIMENSION_TYPE, STATUS, CREATOR, CREATOR_ID, CREATE_TIME, OPERATOR, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{gradeDimensionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{gradeDimensionNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gradeDimensionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{gradeDimensionNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gradeDimensionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

update TOM_GRADE_DIMENSION
GRADE_DIMENSION_NUMBER = #{gradeDimensionNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GRADE_DIMENSION_NAME = #{gradeDimensionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GRADE_DIMENSION_NAME_EN = #{gradeDimensionNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GRADE_DIMENSION_TYPE = #{gradeDimensionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update TOM_GRADE_DIMENSION set GRADE_DIMENSION_NUMBER = #{gradeDimensionNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GRADE_DIMENSION_NAME = #{gradeDimensionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GRADE_DIMENSION_NAME_EN = #{gradeDimensionNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GRADE_DIMENSION_TYPE = #{gradeDimensionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OPERATOR = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where GRADE_DIMENSION_ID = #{gradeDimensionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
SELECT GD.GRADE_DIMENSION_ID AS gradeDimensionId, GD.GRADE_DIMENSION_NAME AS gradeDimensionName, GD.GRADE_DIMENSION_NAME_EN AS gradeDimensionNameEn FROM TOM_GRADE_DIMENSION GD WHERE GD.STATUS = 'Y'
AND GD.GRADE_DIMENSION_TYPE = #{gradeDimensionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT GD.GRADE_DIMENSION_ID AS gradeDimensionId, GD.GRADE_DIMENSION_NAME AS gradeDimensionName, GD.GRADE_DIMENSION_NAME_EN AS gradeDimensionNameEn FROM TOM_GRADE_DIMENSION GD WHERE 1=1
AND GD.GRADE_DIMENSION_ID = #{gradeDimensionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
